mapper.select: SELECT A.PRDT_CD /* 상품코드 */ , A.FEE_SN /* 수수료일련번호 */ , A.APLY_MNUM /* 적용개월수 */ , A.MDWY_RDMP_FEE_RTO /* 중도상환수수료비율 */ , A.HND_DETL_DTM /* 조작상세일시 */ , A.HND_EMPNO /* 조작사원번호 */ , A.HND_TMNL_NO /* 조작단말기번호 */ , A.HND_TR_ID /* 조작거래id */ , A.GUID /* guid */ , 'u' AS queryType FROM IBIMS204B A WHERE A.PRDT_CD = #{prdtCd} ORDER BY A.APLY_MNUM ASC;

foreach.if: INSERT INTO IBIMS204B ( PRDT_CD, FEE_SN, APLY_MNUM, MDWY_RDMP_FEE_RTO, HND_DETL_DTM, HND_EMPNO, HND_TMNL_NO, HND_TR_ID, GUID ) SELECT #{prdtCd}, NVL((SELECT MAX(A.FEE_SN) FROM IBIMS204B A) + 1, 1), #{item.aplyMnum}, #{item.mdwyRdmpFeeRto}, SYSDATE, #{hndEmpno}, ' ' AS HND_TMNL_NO, #{hndTrId}, #{guid} FROM dual WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM IBIMS204B B WHERE 1=1 AND B.PRDT_CD = #{prdtCd} AND B.APLY_MNUM = #{item.aplyMnum} )
